assignment.status.apply: برای این ماموریت کاری درخواست نمایید
assignment.status.company.approve_user: would like you to hire you for this assignment

common.error: Oops, something went a bit wrong... But don't worry, we are on it!
confirmation.applied.for.job.description: We're crossing our fingers for you right now. If the employer makes an offer, you have 18 hours to accept the offer. You'll find the job under My Jobs. This is where you'll also find all communication that happens between you and the employer.
confirmation.applied.for.job.title: You have applied for the job
confirmation.contact.title: Thanks for your message! We will reply as soon as we can.
confirmation.password.reset.description: You can now sign in using your new password.
confirmation.password.reset.link.descrip: If you follow the link provided in the message you can thereafter set a new password.
confirmation.password.reset.link.title: A password reset message has been sent to you!
confirmation.password.reset.title: Successfully changed your password!
contact.form.description: Questions? Thoughts? We'd love to help!
contact.form.email.validation.length: Your email must be at least 6 characters long
contact.form.email.validation.required: You need to enter your email
contact.form.message.validation.length: Your message must be at least 2 characters long
contact.form.message.validation.required: You need to enter a message
contact.form.name.validation.length: Your name must be at least 2 characters long
contact.form.name.validation.required: You need to enter your name
contact.title: Contact
cookies.description: By using the justarrived.se website, you agree to the use of cookies by us and third parties to enhance your experience. For more information, or to change your cookie settings.
cookies.info.description: ما به دلایل فنی از "کوکیز" استفاده می کنیم تا کاربری خدمات مان آسانتر شده و به کاربرانی که از وبسایت ما بازدید می کنند اطلاعات صحیحی ارائه کنیم. از "کوکیز" همچنین برای اندازه گیری ترافیک سایت، جمع آوری آمار و بهتر کردن خدمات  نیز استفاده می شود. شما استفاده از خدمات ما کاربر "کوکیز" را تأیید می کنید، مگر آنکه تنظیمات "کوکیز" را در مرورگر خود تغییر بدهید.
cookies.info.title: در باره ی کوکیز
error.description: Oops, something went a bit wrong... But don't worry, we are on it!

home.header.logged.in.title: Welcome {{username}}!
home.header.logged.out.description: Just Arrived helps you get the credentials you need to enter the Swedish labor market by matching you with Swedish companies. Right now Just Arrived mediates jobs in Stockholm, Gothenburg and Malmö. Create an account to get started!
home.header.logged.out.sub.title: Get the experience you need to enter the Swedish labor market
home.header.logged.out.title: Welcome!
home.instructions.first.section.instruct: Sign in or create an account
home.instructions.first.section.title: This is how it works:
home.instructions.second.section.descrip: In order to increase your chances getting a job:

Sign in often and make sure your profile is up to date

home.partners.description: Just Arrived is a joint pro-bono initiative designed to help newly arrived immigrants to the Swedish labour market. We are owned by a foundation and is run by an association of companies.
